item.description:
Come on out and listen to the Lenny Solomon Band!

Do you like Folk rock/Country music?

If so..Come Check out the Lenny Solomon Band at Punches Alley on Wellesley Campus.
Thursday Feb12th starting at 7:30pm.

Lenny Solomon Band website

Listen to Lenny Solomon Band - Myspace


A note about this thursdays show from Lenny...

This coming Thursday, 2/12/09, we'll be performing
at Punch's Alley in Wellesley College. We will be
splitting the bill with Beth DeSombre. We first met
Beth when we both appeared at a fundraiser for The
Democracy Center last winter. The first track on
her debut CD, Crooked Highways, called No Toll in
Canaan, won honorable mentions in several national
and international songwriting contests, and spent
some time at #1 on Neil Young's list of more than
2400 current protest songs (as did our song, Let's
Go To Mars). Folk icons Pete and Maura Kennedy called
her song "one of the finest songs we have ever heard."

The show will start at 8pm. Beth will do the first
set and we will do the second. Punch's Alley is
the pub in the Wang campus center at Wellesley
College. You can get directions to campus at
http://www.wellesley.....
The campus center is next to the Davis Parking
Facility where free parking is available. The pub
phone number is 781-283-3414 and there is no
admission charge.


I hope to meetup with you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll furnish my cell phone to members that sign up for this event.
item.name: Lenny Solomon Band @ Punch's Alley
